title: The Tragedy of the Creative Commons
dc:creator: Jon Smajda
description: Three topics this week*: Arturo talks about his journey into the world of online discussion forums and blog comments Phil Davison, who has a bachelor’s degree in Sociology, a bachelor’s degree in History, a master’s degree in Public Administration…and a master’s degree in Communication. We discuss Urban Legends: Why suburbs, not cities, are the answer. […]
content:encoded:
Three topics this week*:

  • Arturo talks about his journey into the world of online discussion forums and blog comments
  • Phil Davison, who has a bachelor’s degree in Sociology, a bachelor’s degree in History, a master’s degree in Public Administration…and a master’s degree in Communication.
  • We discuss Urban Legends: Why suburbs, not cities, are the answer.

Download Lucky #13.

* Well, actually last week: this was recorded on September 16.
